title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-5.5 - Monitoring
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-5.5 - Monitoring

State Regulations

The applicable agency reservoir releases manager shall
be responsible for monitoring the water elevations in East Sidney Lake, and for
notifying the department reservoir releases manager at least 24 hours prior to
the time it is estimated that the water elevation in East Sidney Lake will
reach 1,150 feet mean sea level between May 1st and September 30th, inclusive, and 1,140 feet mean sea level between December 1st and April 30th
inclusive. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
672-5.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
